items.sentence: As far as we can tell, Tom wasn\'t involved in the robbery.
A lot of people are waiting to see what is going to happen.
According to the paper, there was an earthquake last night.
As soon as it stopped raining a beautiful rainbow appeared.
Because I had a bad cold, I went to bed earlier than usual.
Because of the storm, we had no choice but to stay at home.
Can you imagine what life would be like without television?
The school Tom goes to is looking for a new French teacher.
Tom and I bought our plane tickets three months in advance.
Tom and Mary have gone swimming together a number of times.
